About

I am currently a Research Resident at VinAI Research where I am fortunate to be mentored by Asst.Prof. Thien Huu Nguyen. Before joining VinAI, I was an Undergraduate Research Student at Data Science Laboratory under the supervision of M.Sc. Linh Van Ngo. I graduated from the Global ICT program at Hanoi University of Science and Technology with a Computer Science Bachelorâ€™s degree.




Research Interests

I am working on problems related to Natural Language Processing and Machine Learning. Specifically, my current main research focuses are cross-domain information extraction and multilingual language understanding. Additionally, I am interested in novel approaches from different fields such as Adversarial Learning, Optimal Transport, Meta Learning, etc to address the problem of low-resource learning
